column1: Conducted Liquid Propane Gas (LPG) tanker ship security details in support of the U.S. Coast Guard Homeland Defense
Trained all SWAT officers to conduct waterborne tactical operations including anti-terrorist operations
Trained all SWAT officers to conduct rappelling operations
Conducted two mutual aid training scenarios with the Suffolk and Virginia Beach SWAT Teams
Organized the regional SWAT Commanders Committee to facilitate mutual aid among tactical teams in the Hampton Roads area
The Chesapeake SWAT Team was tasked three times to cover for other area tactical teams while they were unavailable for call-outs
Equipped and trained all SWAT officers with new M-4 Carbines
SWAT Officers constructed a building clearing training facility at the Police Academy
Conducted a Basic SWAT Training Coarse for the Suffolk Police SWAT Team
